Description: Operates heavy equipment including, but limited to, backhoes, excavators, bobcats, forklifts, trucks, and wheel loaders.Operates excavation and loading machines equipped with scoops, shovels, or buckets that dig gravel and earth.Excavates roads, and land, digs basements using heavy machines including bulldozers, scrapers, compactors, and skid loaders.Load and unload equipment from vehicles and trailers.Completes and submits daily work reports.Expected to be able to do basic repair and maintenance.Must adhere to health and safety protocols at all times.Operates heavy-duty construction equipment in compliance with company safety operating procedures and policies.Ensures the use of any required Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).Handle and operate heavy equipment such as forklifts, bulldozers, dump trucks, backhoes, excavation machines, and mixer trucks.Job Details
